column5: My aluminum trolling plate has small cracks on each corner and I'd like to weld it to prevent further damage. Anyone can recommend a place west of GTA that can do that? Brampton/Mississauga/Oakville/Burlington/Milton....  Thanks.  Ice Fisherman
Wayne, or Irishfield as he is known on the board. Don't know how far west he is of the places you mentioned(he is in Penetanguishen), but for aluminum, he can do it.
